name: Idler Coaster (demo)
description:
Build and upgrades rides, take care of your guests and manage budget sheets like a true capitalist to become the #1 amusement park corporation in the world! 

Game is currently a work in progress.  

Some features may be temporaries or missing. 

To stay in touch, please join the discord: https://discord.gg/8NkBPxbMR7
